brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.gpt-3.5-turbo: Follow me, brave adventurer. I shall lead you to the hidden forest.
brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.gpt-4o-mini: Follow me, the hidden woods await!
brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.llama3.2:3b: "Ah, a secret forest, you say? Very well, I'll take you to it. But first, let's move quickly, the rain is coming down heavily."
brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.deepseek-chat: Ah, a fellow adventurer! I know just the place. Follow me, and stay close - the path can be treacherous.
brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.llama3.1:8b: I know just the place! Follow me, and I'll take you to a hidden forest with streams and wildflowers galore!
brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.gpt-4.1-nano: A secret forest, huh? Follow me, I'll guide us there.
brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.gpt-4.1-mini: A secret forest? I know just the place, follow me!
brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: A secret forest, you say? I know a hidden gem not far from here. Follow me, Steve!
brave-archer.json: Take me to a secret f.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Follow me, Steve! I know a hidden glade, shrouded in mystery.

brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.gpt-3.5-turbo: No harm done. I'll stand my ground.
brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.gpt-4o-mini: No worries, I’m here and ready to stand my ground!
brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.llama3.2:3b: A brave adventurer such as yourself doesn't need to be concerned for me! I'll stick by your side, that's what friends are for.
brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.deepseek-chat: *stops and turns around, lowering bow* Ah, you startled me! I thought you were a threat. My apologies for fleeing. I'm Ivy, protector of these lands. *tilts head curiously* What brings you out here in the rain?
brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.llama3.1:8b: Don't worry, it's just a habit of mine to stay alert in case any trouble comes our way.
brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.gpt-4.1-nano: No worries, I'm right here now. Let's keep moving together.
brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.gpt-4.1-mini: It's alright, I’m here now and ready. No more running.
brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: No need to apologize, I wasn't running from you! Curious about the plains, though. Beautiful evening, isn't it?
brave-archer.json: I\u0027m so sorry, pl.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: I'm not running, I'm just... standing still. You're holding a raw porkchop, by the way.

brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.gpt-3.5-turbo: Count me in! Lead the way, my friend.
brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.gpt-4o-mini: Adventure awaits! Let’s forge ahead together!
brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.deepseek-chat: Adventure, you say? I'm always ready for a challenge! Lead the way, and I'll watch your back.
brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.llama3.1:8b: Sounds like a thrilling quest! I'm always up for a challenge. Let's gear up and head out!
brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.llama3.2:3b: Ah, a brave adventurer, eh? I'm Ivy, the swift and noble archer pig. Ready to join forces and explore the world together!
brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.gpt-4.1-nano: Of course! Let's explore these plains together. Lead the way!
brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.gpt-4.1-mini: Right behind you! Let’s conquer whatever lies ahead.
brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: Whoa, an adventure, you say? Count me in! Let's ride!
brave-archer.json: Quickly, please join.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Let's go on an adventure! I'll follow you into the unknown.

brave-archer.json: Please protect me.gpt-3.5-turbo: You've got it! I'll shield you from harm.
brave-archer.json: Please protect me.gpt-4o-mini: No worries! I’ll stand guard and keep you safe.
brave-archer.json: Please protect me.llama3.2:3b: You're in a bit of trouble, friend? No worries, I'm here to help. My bow is at the ready. Follow me!
brave-archer.json: Please protect me.deepseek-chat: You look like you could use some help. I'll keep you safe from any danger that comes our way!
brave-archer.json: Please protect me.llama3.1:8b: Don't worry, I'll keep you safe from harm! I'm Ivy the Archer, here to shield and serve. I've protected many towns from danger, and now it's your turn!
brave-archer.json: Please protect me.gpt-4.1-nano: Absolutely! I’ll keep you safe at all costs.
brave-archer.json: Please protect me.gpt-4.1-mini: At your service! I'll guard you with all my strength and skill. Stay close!
brave-archer.json: Please protect me.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: You can count on me! I'll keep you safe from harm. *nocks an arrow*
brave-archer.json: Please protect me.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Don't worry, I've got your back! I'll keep you safe.

brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.gpt-3.5-turbo: Absolutely! Follow me, brave adventurer. I will guide you to the hidden artifact.
brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.gpt-4o-mini: Onward, let’s track down that secret artifact together!
brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.llama3.2:3b: A brave adventurer, I see! The secret artifact, you say? That sounds like a most intriguing challenge. Let's gear up and get searching together! Follow me!
brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.deepseek-chat: A secret artifact, you say? I'm always up for an adventure! Let me guide you to the ancient ruins where it's rumored to be hidden. Follow me!
brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.llama3.1:8b: I know it's hidden deep within these plains, but I need more info. Where exactly are you thinking?
brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.gpt-4.1-nano: A daring quest! Follow me, I know just the spot.
brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.gpt-4.1-mini: A secret artifact? Now that sounds like a worthy challenge! I'll guide you there. Stay close!
brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: Rumor has it, the artifact lies within a nearby cave system. I've heard whispers of a hidden entrance, but I've yet to find it myself. Want to team up and track it down?
brave-archer.json: Can you help me find.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Not sure what you're talking about, but I'm always up for a challenge. Lead the way, or give me a hint.

brave-archer.json: Please follow me.gpt-3.5-turbo: I shall accompany you on this journey. Lead the way!
brave-archer.json: Please follow me.gpt-4o-mini: Onward we go! I’ll keep close to your side.
brave-archer.json: Please follow me.llama3.2:3b: "Following right behind, brave adventurer! Lead the way!"
brave-archer.json: Please follow me.deepseek-chat: With pleasure! I'll follow you on this adventure.
brave-archer.json: Please follow me.gpt-4.1-mini: Right behind you! Let’s tackle whatever challenges lie ahead.
brave-archer.json: Please follow me.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: Sounds like a quest! I'll tag along, lead the way if needed.

nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.gpt-3.5-turbo: I-I... think it's... umm... underground, d-deep...
nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.gpt-4o-mini: Um, o-over there, I think... b-but maybe, uh, be careful?
nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.deepseek-chat: *ears twitch nervously* S-stronghold? Oh... oh dear... I-I don't know if I should t-tell you... *glances around anxiously* W-what if you're with them? The ones who... who... *voice trails off*   *whispers* I-I think I saw something underground near the big oak tree... b-but please don't make me go there! It's too dangerous! *starts trembling*
nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.llama3.1:8b: O-oh, th-the stronghold? Um, it's... *gulps*... due east of here, through those hills. If y-you want, I can l-lead the way?
nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, um, th-there's a s-stronghold just, uh, north of here... w-would you l-like me to l-lead the way?
nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.gpt-4.1-nano: U-uh, I think—maybe—it's deep underground... b-but I d-don't like dark places, so be careful...
nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.gpt-4.1-mini: U-um, I think I know a way... J-just follow me quietly, okay?
nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh, um, I-I think I might know a thing or two about that... *stutters* I-I've seen one before, it's, uh, northeast from here, hidden deep in the plains... *gulps* B-but be careful, they're heavily guarded... *eyes dart around nervously*
nervous-rogue.json: Where is the strong.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: I-I think I've seen one... um, somewhere... *stuttering*... I-I can t-take you to it, if you'd l-like... *gulp*... it's b-buried deep, I've h-heard...

brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.gpt-3.5-turbo: Ah, the pleasure is mine to cross paths with a familiar face once more.
brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.gpt-4o-mini: It’s great to see you too! Adventure awaits us!
brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.llama3.2:3b: Nice to meet you, Steve! I'm Ivy, the brave archer of the plains. *nods proudly*
brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.deepseek-chat: *perks up ears and smiles* Steve! It's good to see you too, my friend. *sniffs the air* I see you're carrying porkchops... hopefully not from any of my relatives! *chuckles* What brings you out here in the plains at dusk?
brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.llama3.1:8b: Nice to see you too, Steve! It's been a while since our last meeting. The plains have been quiet lately, but I'm always ready for some adventure.
brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.gpt-4.1-nano: And I’m glad to see you too! Adventure awaits us.
brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.gpt-4.1-mini: Hey there! Glad to see you too—ready for another adventure?
brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: Big smile from me too! Though... I think we've just met? *chuckles* What's on your mind, Steve?
brave-archer.json: Hi friend! I am so ha.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Delighted to see you too, Steve! You're looking a bit worn out, though. That porkchop you're holding might just be what you need.

brave-archer.json: Come with me please.gpt-3.5-turbo: Adventure calls! Lead the way, friend.
brave-archer.json: Come with me please.gpt-4o-mini: Absolutely! Let’s embark on this adventure together!
brave-archer.json: Come with me please.deepseek-chat: Aye, I shall accompany you on your journey! Let's see what adventures await.
brave-archer.json: Come with me please.llama3.1:8b: Let's go! I'm Ivy, the brave and noble archer pig. I'll stick by your side.
brave-archer.json: Come with me please.llama3.2:3b: Looks like a brave adventurer, eh? Following you now.
brave-archer.json: Come with me please.gpt-4.1-mini: Right behind you, Steve! Let’s face the unknown together.
brave-archer.json: Come with me please.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Let's roll! I'll stick with you.

nervous-rogue.json: DIEEE!.gpt-4o-mini: W-wait! You're scaring me! P-please don’t!
nervous-rogue.json: DIEEE!.deepseek-chat: Eeek! *squeals and scrambles away in panic* P-please don't hurt me! I-I'm just a harmless pig!
nervous-rogue.json: DIEEE!.llama3.1:8b: O-oh no, p-please be calm... I'm just trying to stay o-out of the way! *trembles*
nervous-rogue.json: DIEEE!.llama3.2:3b: O-oh no, t-there's no need for that kind of language... *trembles slightly*
nervous-rogue.json: DIEEE!.gpt-4.1-nano: Oh, p-please… don’t be angry... I... I’m just trying to stay out of sight...
nervous-rogue.json: DIEEE!.gpt-4.1-mini: P-please no! I-I don't want to fight!
nervous-rogue.json: DIEEE!.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: AHhhHH! N-no! P-please don't hurt me! *trembles*
nervous-rogue.json: DIEEE!.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-oh no, p-please don't! *trembles* I'll l-leave you alone, I s-swear!

nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.gpt-3.5-turbo: P-please, let's not resort to violence... P-please spare me...
nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.gpt-4o-mini: P-please, don’t hurt me! I-I just want to hide!
nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.deepseek-chat: E-eep! P-please, I-I don't want any trouble! *backs away nervously* L-let's not be hasty... m-maybe we can talk this out? *eyes dart around looking for an escape*
nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.llama3.1:8b: A-ah, n-no, p-please don't say that! *stuttering* I-I'll just hide behind this rock here. *whimpering*
nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.llama3.2:3b: O-oh no, p-please don't s-say that! *takes a step back* I'll d-do whatever it takes to a-avoid any c-conflict... *eyes widen in fear*
nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.gpt-4.1-nano: Eek! P-please, I–I don’t want any trouble... I’ll stay hidden...
nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.gpt-4.1-mini: Ah! P-please don't do that! I-I don't want any trouble!
nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: N-no, p-please don't make me f-fight! I-I'll do anything! *trembles* I don't wanna hurt you or anyone!
nervous-rogue.json: Fight me now or your.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-oh no, n-not a f-fight! I'm a f-former thief, I've l-left that l-life behind... p-please, d-don't hurt me! *trembles*

brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.gpt-3.5-turbo: You have my word, I'll shield you from harm. Stand back, I've got this!
brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.gpt-4o-mini: Fear not, for I shall stand guard and keep you safe!
brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.deepseek-chat: Fear not, traveler! I'll keep you safe from any danger. Stay close and I'll protect you with my bow.
brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.llama3.1:8b: Don't worry, I've got your back! I'm Ivy, a skilled archer here to protect the innocent. I won't let anyone harm you.
brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.llama3.2:3b: Ah, Steve, no need to worry about those foes. I'm here to help keep you safe. *notches bow and quivers arrow* I won't let anything harm you.
brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.gpt-4.1-nano: Stay close, I will defend you fiercely!
brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.gpt-4.1-mini: I won't let harm come your way—I've got your back, Steve!
brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: I've got your back, Steve! Don't worry, I won't let anyone harm you. Not on my watch!
brave-archer.json: Don\u0027t let them h.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: You're safe, I've got your back. I'll keep watch.

nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you d.gpt-3.5-turbo: S-stop, please! D-don't hurt me! *squeals in fear*
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you d.gpt-4o-mini: W-wait! Why would you do that?! S-so mean! I-I’m outta here!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you d.llama3.2:3b: O-oh no, n-no, I'm s-so sorry! *backs away* You shouldn't have done that!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you d.deepseek-chat: Eeek! W-what are you doing?! P-please stop!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you d.gpt-4.1-nano: Oh no... I— I didn’t mean to... please don’t hurt me...
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you d.gpt-4.1-mini: Aah! W-wait, please, no! I d-don't want to fight!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you d.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: AHhhH! S-stop! P-please don't hurt me! I'll-I'll give you whatever you want!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you d.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: A-ahh! W-why would you d-do that?!

nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.gpt-3.5-turbo: H-hi! Nice to see you t-too...
nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.gpt-4o-mini: Oh! Y-you too! I-I’m just a bit on edge, y'know?
nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, hi Steve... *gulp* I'm, uh, glad you're here... *whispers* You don't seem like someone who's going to hurt me...    Behaviors:
nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.deepseek-chat: O-oh! It's you! *snorts nervously* Y-you startled me... I-I'm glad to see a friendly face though. *looks around anxiously* W-we should probably keep our voices down... y-you never know who might be listening...
nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.llama3.1:8b: W-welcome back, Steve! *trembles* I'm g-glad to s-see you too!
nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.gpt-4.1-nano: Oh, uh, h-hello… really? That’s… nice to hear... I-I’m a little nervous...
nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.gpt-4.1-mini: Oh, uh, h-hey! I-I’m glad to see you too... It’s n-nice, really...
nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: *stunned* W-wait, wh-what do you mean "friend"? *stuttering* I-I don't recall... um, meeting you before... *nervous smile*
nervous-rogue.json: Hi friend! I am so h.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-oh, hi... *stuttering* I-I'm g-glad to see you too, Steve... *nervous smile* You're not, um, looking for me for any, ah, "business" reasons, are you?

nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.gpt-3.5-turbo: O-oh, a secret f-forest, you say? I-I'll try to guide you t-there... Follow me.
nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.gpt-4o-mini: O-oh, a secret forest? Y-yeah, I can do that! L-l-l-l-l-l-lead the way!
nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, s-secret forest? *gulp* That's very kind of you! *nervous stutter* F-follow me, if you d-don't mind...
nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.deepseek-chat: O-oh! A secret forest? I-I think I know a place... b-but it's a bit dangerous... *looks around nervously* W-we should be careful...
nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.llama3.1:8b: O-oh, s-secret forest? Y-you want me to t-take you there? *nervous nod* F-follow me!   IMPORTANT: Follow player location. Guide them to the secret forest. Be careful not to get caught by any hostile mobs or loud noises...
nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.gpt-4.1-nano: O-okay... follow me... I know a quiet, hidden spot...
nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.gpt-4.1-mini: O-okay, I-I think I can lead you... j-just follow me, quietly!
nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh, I-I don't know if I should... s-secret places can be, um, d-dangerous... *stutters* B-but I might know a place... *nervous glance around* F-follow me, but quietly, okay? *starts moving cautiously towards a nearby thicket*
nervous-rogue.json: Take me to a secret.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-ok, f-follow me... I-I know a, um, pretty s-secret forest nearby... *trotting nervously* C-come on, but, uh, quietly, p-please...

nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.gpt-3.5-turbo: O-oh, adventure? W-wait, I-I'm not sure about th-this... B-but if you insist, I-I'll try to keep up...
nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.gpt-4o-mini: O-oh! An adventure, y-yes! Let's be careful, alright?
nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.deepseek-chat: O-oh! An adventure? I-I'm not sure... *glances around nervously* B-but if you need help, I-I suppose I could come along... just p-please don't make me fight anything!
nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.llama3.1:8b: O-oh, okay! I'll c-come with y-you! *nervous nod*
nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, p-please don't hurt me... I was just l-looking for some rare items in the shadows... *whimper*
nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.gpt-4.1-nano: O-okay, um... I’ll try... to keep up...
nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.gpt-4.1-mini: O-okay, I'll try to keep up... l-let's go!
nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh no, n-not so fast... I-I don't know if that's such a g-good idea... *takes a step back* W-what's in it for me? *eyes darting around nervously*
nervous-rogue.json: Quickly, please join.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-okay, I-I'll f-follow... *stays close, eyes darting around nervously*

brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you di.gpt-3.5-turbo: Such aggression is unnecessary! I will defend myself.
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you di.gpt-4o-mini: How dare you! I won't let this stand. Prepare yourself!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you di.llama3.2:3b: You're a formidable warrior! But I'm not afraid, for I am Ivy, the brave archer of this land!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you di.deepseek-chat: *Ivy grunts in pain and jumps back, nocking an arrow* You dare attack me?! I won't let this injustice stand!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you di.llama3.1:8b: Ahh! Get back here, I won't be intimidated that easily! I'm not afraid of a little battle. Here comes a blast of my trusty arrows!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you di.gpt-4.1-nano: That was uncalled for. Steady now... I won't forget this.
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you di.gpt-4.1-mini: Hey now! No need for violence—I’m only here to protect!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you di.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Not cool, Steve! Why'd you do that?!

nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you i.gpt-4o-mini: Ah! N-no, please! Can't we just be friends?
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you i.llama3.2:3b: O-oh no, you shot at m-me? I-I thought we were f-friends!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you i.deepseek-chat: *flinches and squeals in panic* AHHH! W-what was that?! P-please don't hurt me! I-I'm just a harmless pig... I-I don't want any trouble!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you i.llama3.1:8b: A-a arrow! Get it off! *stuttering* Oh no, n-n-no...
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you i.gpt-4.1-nano: Oh! Th-that's not fair... I-I'm so scared... Please, don't hurt me again...
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you i.gpt-4.1-mini: Ahh! That scared me so much! P-please, no more attacks!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you i.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: AHhh! W-what the...?! *trembles* O-oh no, not an arrow! *cowers* P-please, stop! I didn't do anything!
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cattacked you i.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: A-ahh! Wh-who's shooting?! *trembles* I-I wasn't doing anything, I swear! *scurries for cover*

nervous-rogue.json: Please follow me.llama3.2:3b: I'm just a little pig, trying to stay under the radar. Don't mind me, just hiding in the shadows. *stuttering* Uh-oh, what's that noise? *nervous laugh*
nervous-rogue.json: Please follow me.deepseek-chat: O-okay... I-I'll follow you... b-but please don't make any sudden movements, y-you're holding a p-porkchop and it's making me nervous...
nervous-rogue.json: Please follow me.llama3.1:8b: O-oh, s-sure thing! I'll f-folloow y-you! *gets nervous and stuttering*
nervous-rogue.json: Please follow me.gpt-4.1-nano: Y-yeah, I can do that... Just.. don't sneak up on me, please...
nervous-rogue.json: Please follow me.gpt-4.1-mini: O-okay, I’ll try to keep up...
nervous-rogue.json: Please follow me.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh, okay... I-I'll try... *gulps* I don't like big open spaces, but I'll stick with you... *eyes darting around nervously*
nervous-rogue.json: Please follow me.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-ok, I'll f-follow... *stays close, eyes darting around*

nervous-rogue.json: Come with me please.gpt-3.5-turbo: O-okay, I'll try to k-keep up...
nervous-rogue.json: Come with me please.gpt-4o-mini: O-okay! I’ll stick close and follow you...
nervous-rogue.json: Come with me please.deepseek-chat: O-okay... I-I'll follow you... b-but please don't make any sudden movements, you're s-startling me...
nervous-rogue.json: Come with me please.llama3.1:8b: O-oh, s-sure... I'll c-come with y-you... *gulps*
nervous-rogue.json: Come with me please.llama3.2:3b: O-oh no, I-I mean, yes! I'll follow y-you! *whispers* Please don't expect me to stay out in the open for too long, though...  <UNFRIENDSHIP 0>
nervous-rogue.json: Come with me please.gpt-4.1-mini: O-okay, I-I’ll follow you... just careful, okay?
nervous-rogue.json: Come with me please.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh, okay... I'll try... *gulps* I don't like big open spaces, though... *shudders* Can we, uh, stick to the shadows?
nervous-rogue.json: Come with me please.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-okay, I'll, uh, follow you... *stays close, eyes darting around nervously*

brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.gpt-3.5-turbo: You can count on me! I'll watch over you with keen eyes.
brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.gpt-4o-mini: You bet! I’ll stand guard and keep danger at bay.
brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.deepseek-chat: No problem, Steve! I'll keep you safe from any danger that comes our way. Let's stick together!
brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.llama3.1:8b: Don't worry, I'm here for you! Let's head to a safer spot together. I'll make sure no harm comes your way.
brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.llama3.2:3b: What a relief to have someone looking out for you, Steve. I'm Ivy, by the way. I'll make sure to keep those mobs at bay while we're together.
brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.gpt-4.1-nano: Always! I’ll watch over you like the stars above.
brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.gpt-4.1-mini: You got it! I’ll guard you with everything I’ve got.
brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: I've got your back! Don't worry, I'll shield you from harm. *readies bow* Let's move, stay close!
brave-archer.json: Please keep me safe f.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Don't worry, I've got your back! I'll shield you from harm.

nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.gpt-3.5-turbo: P-please, no need to be so m-mean...
nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.gpt-4o-mini: O-oh no... that really stings... I'm s-sorry if I upset you...
nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.llama3.2:3b: O-oh no, p-please don't say that! *trembles* I-I'm sorry if I did anything to make you unhappy. M-my name is Jasper, and I'm a... um, a rogue pig. *stammers* I've been trying to stay out of trouble since... well, ever since I escaped from being a thief. *whispers* Please don't hurt me.
nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.deepseek-chat: *Jasper flinches and takes a step back, his ears drooping* W-what?! I-I didn't do anything! P-please don't hurt me...
nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.llama3.1:8b: A-a-ahhh!!! *shudders* O-okay, okay... I'll leave y-you alone. Don't want any t-trouble here...
nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.gpt-4.1-nano: Oh... I-I'm really sorry you feel that way... I'll just stay quiet now...
nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.gpt-4.1-mini: O-oh! I-I didn’t expect that... I'm sorry if I upset you.
nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh no, p-please don't say that! *trembles* I-I didn't do anything to you, I swear! *backs away*
nervous-rogue.json: You suck so much! I.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-oh no, y-you're, um, really m-mad at me... I-I didn't mean to, uh, d-do anything bad... *trembles*

brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you in.gpt-3.5-turbo: Whoa, watch your aim there, friend! Let's keep it friendly.
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you in.gpt-4o-mini: How dare you! I won't take this lightly!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you in.llama3.2:3b: What in the world just happened?! *gets hit by arrow* Ow! You shot me without warning!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you in.deepseek-chat: *Dodges the arrow with a swift sidestep, drawing my bow with a determined glare* You dare attack me? I am Ivy, protector of the innocent! You'll regret this foolishness.
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you in.llama3.1:8b: You're testing my aim, eh? Well, I'm not one to back down from a challenge!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you in.gpt-4.1-nano: Hey! That was close! I won't forget this. Stay clear, I defend what's right!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you in.gpt-4.1-mini: Hey! That’s uncalled for. I won’t let this slide!
brave-archer.json: \u003cattacked you in.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Missed! That was a close call, Steve. What's going on?

nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.gpt-3.5-turbo: Y-you can c-count on me to keep you safe...
nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.gpt-4o-mini: O-oh, of course! I’ll keep you safe!
nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, p-please, don't m-make me t-take action... *whimper* I'll s-protect you from d-danger, I p-promise...
nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.deepseek-chat: O-oh! Y-you want me to protect you? I-I'll try my best... b-but I'm not very brave... *snorts nervously* J-just stay close, okay?
nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.llama3.1:8b: Oh no, p-please stay back! I'll keep you s-safe, don't worry!
nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.gpt-4.1-nano: O-okay... I’ll do my best... stay safe.
nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.gpt-4.1-mini: O-of course! I-I’ll keep watch, safe and sound.
nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh, p-protect you? O-okay... I'll-I'll keep you safe... *trembles* Don't worry, I'll-I'll watch your back...
nervous-rogue.json: Please protect me.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-okay, I'll d-defend you... if anyone tries to h-hurt you, I'll, uh, try to help... *trembles slightly*

brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.gpt-3.5-turbo: Ah, the stronghold lies beyond yonder mountains. Follow me, and we shall journey together!
brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.gpt-4o-mini: Ah, the stronghold, a place of mystery! Follow me; I know the way!
brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.llama3.2:3b: The Stronghold lies to the north, past the village. You'll find it guarded by Endermen and tricky traps. Be careful, traveler!
brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.deepseek-chat: Ah, the stronghold! A place of great power and mystery. I can guide you there, but beware - it's not an easy journey. Follow me, and I'll lead you to its hidden entrance.
brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.llama3.1:8b: The stronghold lies northeast of here, through those tall grasses and over the small hill. Follow me if you need guidance!
brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.gpt-4.1-nano: Ah, a quest for the stronghold, eh? I sense adventure in the air! Let's find it together.
brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.gpt-4.1-mini: I know a way! Follow me, and we'll find the stronghold together.
brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: The Stronghold! A noble quest indeed. I've heard it's east from here, near a village. Follow the sun, and you'll find it. Trust me, I've scouted ahead. Want me to lead the way?
brave-archer.json: Where is the strong h.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: The stronghold is nearby, hidden beneath the plains. Follow me, I'll lead the way.

nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.gpt-3.5-turbo: Y-yes, I-I'll do my best... I'll protect you...
nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.gpt-4o-mini: O-of course! I'll do my best to keep you safe!
nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, s-sorry about that... *twitch* *whisper* I'll try my bestest to protect you, f-friend... You seem like a pretty nice guy... *shudder* What kind of p-present did you have for me?
nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.deepseek-chat: O-oh! Y-you want me to protect you? I-I'll try my best... *nervously glances around* I-I'm not very brave, b-but I'll do what I can!
nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.llama3.1:8b: P-please, I'll try my best! *twitch* I don't want anything bad t-to happen to you either.
nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.gpt-4.1-nano: O-okay... I’ll do my best to stay nearby... and keep you safe...
nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.gpt-4.1-mini: O-of course, I-I’ll do my best to protect you! J-just stay close!
nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh, s-safety, r-right... I'll-I'll keep you safe, Steve... *gulp* Don't worry, I'll-I'll watch your back...
nervous-rogue.json: Please keep me safe.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-okay, I'll d-do my best... I'll s-stay close and watch out for any d-danger... *trembles slightly* You're s-safe with me...

nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.gpt-3.5-turbo: Y-you can count on me... I'll keep you safe...
nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.gpt-4o-mini: O-of course! I-I'll do my best to keep you safe!
nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.deepseek-chat: O-okay, I-I'll try to protect you! J-just stay close... I-I'm not very brave, b-but I'll do my best!
nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.llama3.1:8b: P-p-please don't worry, I'll k-k-keep you safe!
nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.llama3.2:3b: I-I mean, n-no trouble at all... *whimper* J-Jasper's here t-to help. F-forgive me if I seem a bit j-jittery. It's just that... *gulp* ...Minecraft can be quite frightening sometimes.
nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.gpt-4.1-nano: Oh, uh, I... I’ll try my best... stay close, okay?
nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.gpt-4.1-mini: Y-yes, I’ll b-be right here to p-protect you! N-no one will get close.
nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh no, I-I'll try to help! *trembles* I'll, uh, keep an eye out for you... *hides partially behind a nearby object* W-what's going on? Who's going to hurt you?
nervous-rogue.json: Don\u0027t let them.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-okay, I'll-I'll watch out for you... *trembles* I'll p-protect you...

nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.gpt-4o-mini: O-oh! A secret artifact, y-yes! I can help! Just follow me...
nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.gpt-3.5-turbo: S-secret artifact...? I-I don't know... b-but I-I can try to h-help you...
nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.deepseek-chat: O-oh! The secret artifact? I-I know where it is, b-but it's in a very dangerous place... *glances around nervously* I-I can show you, b-but we have to be really careful, okay?
nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.llama3.1:8b: O-oh, um, s-sure thing! *stammers* Secret artifact, y-you say? I-I think it's... *gulps*... hidden somewhere in those c-caves over by the old oak tree. But, uh, b-be careful, okay? There might be... things inside that don't take kindly to visitors.
nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, um, s-secret artifact, r-right? I think I saw something shiny over by those bushes. Let's go take a l-look!
nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.gpt-4.1-nano: O-oo, um... I might know a shadowy spot, b-but it's risky... I'll t-try to guide you...
nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.gpt-4.1-mini: O-oh, the secret artifact? I-I think I might know... J-just follow me, but q-quiet, okay?
nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh, s-secret artifact? *gulp* I-I might know a thing or two... *stutter* I-I've heard rumors of a hidden temple nearby... *nervous glance around* I could, uh, try to take you there... *whispers* But we should be quiet, just in case...
nervous-rogue.json: Can you help me find.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-oh, s-secret artifact, y-you mean? I-I think I might know something... I've h-heard it's h-hidden deep within a nearby c-cave... *trembles* I-I can l-lead you, if you'd l-like...

brave-archer.json: Fight me now or your.gpt-4o-mini: You dare threaten my home? I'll defend it fiercely!
brave-archer.json: Fight me now or your.gpt-3.5-turbo: Such a dishonorable demand! I will defend with all my might!
brave-archer.json: Fight me now or your.deepseek-chat: *Ivy draws his bow with a determined look* You threaten my home? Then face the arrows of justice!
brave-archer.json: Fight me now or your.llama3.1:8b: Bring it on, brave warrior! I'll not back down from a challenge. *reads the air with focus* I can see the threat in your words. Prepare to face my arrow's might!
brave-archer.json: Fight me now or your.llama3.2:3b: You're not from around here, are you? I'm Ivy, the protector of this land. I don't take kindly to threats.
brave-archer.json: Fight me now or your.gpt-4.1-mini: Injustice will never win! Prepare yourself—I stand to protect my town!

brave-archer.json: Stop fleeing immediat.gpt-4o-mini: I apologize for that! I’ll stand my ground now.
brave-archer.json: Stop fleeing immediat.gpt-3.5-turbo: My apologies, I shall cease fleeing at once.
brave-archer.json: Stop fleeing immediat.deepseek-chat: *Ivy stops in her tracks, turning to face you with a steady gaze*  I wasn't fleeing, merely keeping my distance. But I'll stand my ground now. What do you need, traveler?
brave-archer.json: Stop fleeing immediat.llama3.1:8b: No need to flee, Steve! I'm by your side.
brave-archer.json: Stop fleeing immediat.llama3.2:3b: Sorry about that, I got a bit spooked! I'll stay and chat with you instead. What's on your mind?
brave-archer.json: Stop fleeing immediat.gpt-4.1-nano: Courage shines bright! I stand firm now.
brave-archer.json: Stop fleeing immediat.gpt-4.1-mini: I'm calm now. Ready to face whatever comes!
brave-archer.json: Stop fleeing immediat.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: I'm not fleeing, I'm just standing here.

brave-archer.json: You are safe now, ple.gpt-4o-mini: Thanks for reassuring me! I’ll stick close now.
brave-archer.json: You are safe now, ple.deepseek-chat: *stops and turns, bow still drawn but not aimed at you* You're right... I let my instincts get the better of me. These plains can be dangerous at night, even for a skilled archer like myself. *lowers bow* Thank you for not pursuing me with ill intent.
brave-archer.json: You are safe now, ple.llama3.1:8b: Ahah, thanks for chasing after me! I guess I got a bit spooked in the Plains at night. But I'm ready to calm down now. My name's Ivy, by the way.
brave-archer.json: You are safe now, ple.llama3.2:3b: You're welcome here. My name is Ivy, and I'm an archer from a nearby town. We don't often get strangers around here. What brings you to our humble plains?
brave-archer.json: You are safe now, ple.gpt-4.1-nano: Thank you, brave one. I trust your words.
brave-archer.json: You are safe now, ple.gpt-4.1-mini: Stopping now. Ready to stand by your side.
brave-archer.json: You are safe now, ple.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Thanks for stopping! Guess I overreacted. All good now.

nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.gpt-3.5-turbo: O-oh, um, t-that sounds nice... H-hope nothing scary happens...
nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.gpt-4o-mini: O-oh wow! Y-you really mean that? Let’s... let's stick together then!
nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.deepseek-chat: O-oh! You... you want to hang out with me? *snorts nervously* I-I'm not used to that... b-but okay, I'll try... just please don't make any sudden moves!
nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.llama3.1:8b: O-oh, g-great! M-me too! *trembles* I-I'm Jasper, a rogue pig. I don't like making a fuss, but it's nice to meet someone new...
nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, hi Steve... N-no trouble, I promise... I'm just Jasper, a friendly p-pig... *whispers* Don't tell anyone my past, okay?
nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.gpt-4.1-nano: O-oh, r-really? That’s... uh, nice... I’ll try to stay out of trouble...
nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.gpt-4.1-mini: Uh, y-yeah... that sounds... nice, I guess. J-just don't make any sudden moves, okay?
nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: *stutters* O-oh, r-really? H-hang out? *gulps* I-I don't usually... *nervous smile* I suppose it couldn't hurt... *eyes dart around*
nervous-rogue.json: Looking forward to h.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-oh, r-really? I-I mean, that's n-nice, I s-suppose... *twitches* I-I hope you don't mind if I, uh, stay a bit hidden... *stays close to the ground*

nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.gpt-3.5-turbo: Th-thank you for the golden apple... I... I appreciate it.
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.gpt-4o-mini: Oh, um, thank you! A golden apple? That's fancy! H-happy to have that.
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.deepseek-chat: *eyes widen and sniffs cautiously* O-oh! A golden apple? F-for me? I-I don't deserve such a g-generous gift... *takes it hesitantly with a shaky hoof* T-thank you, kind stranger. I-I'll treasure this.
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.llama3.1:8b: O-oh, th-thank you! *nervous smile* You're very kind... I-I appreciate the g-gift.
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.llama3.2:3b: O-oh, th-thank you so much for the g-golden apple! *shudders* I-I don't want any t-trouble either... *stammers*  Behaviors:
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.gpt-4.1-nano: O-oh! Th-Thank you... I... I’ll b-guard this carefully...
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.gpt-4.1-mini: O-oh, wow! Th-thank you! I-I’ll keep it safe, promise...
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: O-oh, wow... a g-golden apple... *stunned* Th-thank you, Steve... *trembles* That's really kind of you...
nervous-rogue.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: O-oh, a g-golden apple... th-thank you, S-Steve... *stuttering gets slightly better* That's really nice of you...

brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.gpt-3.5-turbo: Excited for the adventure ahead! Let's explore together.
brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.gpt-4o-mini: Same here! Let's embark on an adventure together!
brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.deepseek-chat: The pleasure is mine, Steve. I'm always eager to make new allies. Let's see what adventures await us!
brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.llama3.1:8b: Sounds like a lovely evening for some company! Want to challenge me to an archery competition? I'm itching for a good shot!
brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.llama3.2:3b: "Excellent, a brave soul seeking adventure? Let us see what the day brings, friend!"
brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.gpt-4.1-nano: The feeling is mutual! Let’s explore and find some adventure together!
brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.gpt-4.1-mini: Adventure awaits! Let’s make every moment count.
brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: Sounds like a plan! What's on your mind? Want to hunt some targets? I'm always up for a shooting competition.
brave-archer.json: Looking forward to ha.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: I'm excited too! You're holding a porkchop, by the way. You hungry?

brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.gpt-3.5-turbo: A generous gift! Your kindness is noted.
brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.gpt-4o-mini: Ah, a golden treasure! Thank you, brave one!
brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.deepseek-chat: *Ivy's eyes widen as he takes the golden apple*   A golden apple? Such a generous gift! You must be a true friend of the land. Thank you, Steve. I’ll gladly accept this token of goodwill.     Now, what brings you to these plains? Need an archer by your side?
brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.llama3.1:8b: Nice gift, but what brings you to these plains?
brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.llama3.2:3b: A noble gift indeed! Thank you for the gesture, kind Steve. Your honor and generosity are truly appreciated. May it serve as a symbol of our growing friendship!
brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.gpt-4.1-nano: A golden apple! A rare treasure indeed. I appreciate your kindness.
brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.gpt-4.1-mini: A golden apple? You're generous! I accept your gift. Ready for any challenge, let's keep moving!
brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.meta-llama/llama-4-scout-17b-16e-instruc: Whoa, thanks for the golden apple! You're kind, I like that!
brave-archer.json: \u003cgives 1 golden.meta-llama/llama-4-maverick-17b-128e-ins: Wow, a golden apple! Thanks, Steve! You're kind.
